code: import{LOG_IN,CREATE_USER,LOG_OUT}from'../types';var defaultState=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('auth'));export default(function(){var auth=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOG_IN:case CREATE_USER:return action.payload;case LOG_OUT:return null;default:return auth;}});
